name: UK Truck Simulator
summary:
Get behind the wheel of trucks inspired by real designs from 7 major European truck manufacturers, including official license from MAN. Deliver cargo between 18 big UK cities connected by a network of motorways as well as smaller roads. Pick from over 60 different loads. Drive on the left, with the steering wheel on the right!

Start your career as an employee of a cargo transportation company, work hard to be able to buy our own truck and start your own business. Purchase garages and setup branch offices across the UK to accommodate your growing truck fleet. Upgrade your trucks and keep them in top conditions for maximum efficiency.
